00021 //
00022 //  SAGA spec:
00023 //
00024 //  package saga.object
00025 //  {
00026 //    enum object_type 
00027 //    {
00028 //       Exception = 1,
00029 //       URL = 2,
00030 //       Buffer = 3,
00031 //       Session = 4,
00032 //       Context = 5,
00033 //       Task = 6,
00034 //       TaskContainer = 7,
00035 //       Metric = 8,
00036 //       NSEntry = 9,
00037 //       NSDirectory = 10,
00038 //       IOVec = 11,
00039 //       File = 12,
00040 //       Directory = 13,
00041 //       LogicalFile = 14,
00042 //       LogicalDirectory = 15,
00043 //       JobDescription = 16,
00044 //       JobService = 17,
00045 //       Job = 18,
00046 //       JobSelf = 19,
00047 //       StreamService = 20,
00048 //       Stream = 21,
00049 //       Parameter = 22,
00050 //       RPC = 23,
00051 //    }
00052 // 
00053 //    interface object 
00054 //    {  
00055 //      get_id (out string      id     );
00056 //      get_type (out object_type type   );
00057 //      get_session (out session     session);
00058 //      clone (out object clone );
00059 //    }
00060 //  }
00061

00069   class SAGA_EXPORT object 
00070   {
00071     public:
00076       enum type 
00077       {
00078           Unknown          =  -1,
00079           Exception        =   1,
00080           URL              =   2,
00081           Buffer           =   3,
00082           Session          =   4,

00095           JobService       =  17,
00096           Job              =  18,
00097           JobSelf          =  19,
00098           StreamService    =  20,
00099           Stream           =  21,
00100           Parameter        =  22,
00101           RPC              =  23,
00102         
00103       // SAGA Message API extension
00104           Msg              =  24,
00105           Endpoint         =  25,
00106         
00107       // SAGA Information services extension
00108           Advert           =  26,
00109           AdvertDirectory  =  27,
00110 
00111       // SAGA Service Discovery extension
00112           ServiceDescription = 28,

00114           ServiceData        = 30,
00115

00119           CPRJob             = 33,
00120           CPRJobSelf         = 34,
00121           CPRCheckpoint      = 35,
00122           CPRDirectory       = 36
00123       };
